item.title: Contact Us I
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row header_feature="yes" padding_top="100" padding_bottom="100" margin_bottom="0"][vc_column width="1/3"][grve_icon_box align="center" icon_library="entypo" icon_color="white" icon_shape="circle" icon_shape_color="primary-5" title="HANDCRAFTED ELEMENTS" heading="h5" icon_hover_effect="yes" animation="fadeInUp" animation_delay="300" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-compass"]Especially handmade for the theme’s preferences which harmoniously use the Visual Composer.[/grve_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][grve_icon_box align="center" icon_library="entypo" icon_color="white" icon_shape="circle" icon_shape_color="primary-5" title="HIGH QUALITY PRODUCTS" heading="h5" icon_hover_effect="yes" animation="fadeInUp" animation_delay="600" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-clock"]You can check on your own our portfolio to see that we do not create 'bulk' products.[/grve_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][grve_icon_box align="center" icon_library="entypo" icon_color="white" icon_shape="circle" icon_shape_color="primary-5" title="OUTSTANDING SUPPORT" heading="h5" icon_hover_effect="yes" animation="fadeInUp" animation_delay="900" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-lifebuoy"]For you to stand out we take pride in supporting you all the way through.[/grve_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][grve_divider][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top="70" padding_bottom="100" margin_bottom="0"][vc_column width="1/2" tablet_sm_width="1"][grve_slogan title="LOCATE US IN THE CENTRE OF LONDON" heading="h3" increase_heading="160" subtitle="We are Blade team by Greatives" animation="fadeInLeft" button_text="" button2_text=""][/grve_slogan][vc_column_text animation="fadeInLeft" animation_delay="400"]

Usu et utinam altera. Ea esse graece ullamcorper per, his eius mediocrem ei. Vix et lorem imperdiet repudiare, fugit liber has ne, ius tibique definitionem ne. Vim epicurei interesset eu, falli mediocrem et eum. Mel id insolens theophrastus, te mandamus intellegat vis.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text animation="fadeInLeft" animation_delay="400"]

Ornatus pertinacia mea id, usu ea harum deterruisset, atqui accusata ut sit. Et vis alia denique, ex hinc errem percipit vim, duo no reque justo omnes. Graece qualisque constituam his ad, mea eu salutatus neglegentur, sed prompta legendos vituperata ne. Vis ut quidam iriure, nihil impetus periculis vel et.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" tablet_sm_width="1"][contact-form-7 id="642"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row heading_color="light" section_type="fullwidth" equal_column_height="middle-content" bg_type="color" margin_bottom="0" bg_color="#232323"][vc_column width="1/2" tablet_sm_width="1" css=".vc_custom_1445076815311{background-image: url(http://greatives.eu/themes/blade/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/img-142.jpg?id=7807) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="350"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" tablet_sm_width="1" css=".vc_custom_1443432158879{padding-right: 8% !important;padding-left: 8% !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="150"][grve_icon_box icon_size="small" icon_library="entypo" icon_color="primary-5" title="GROUNDBREAKERS" heading="h5" animation="fadeInRight" animation_delay="300" margin_bottom="0" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-flag"]Boundless creativity. Never rest, always in a creative flux. We test the limits of creativity every single day to meet the most demanding minds out there.[/grve_icon_box][vc_empty_space height="60"][grve_icon_box icon_size="small" icon_library="entypo" icon_color="primary-5" title="PROBLEM SOLVERS" heading="h5" animation="fadeInRight" animation_delay="600" margin_bottom="0" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-user-add"]Excel for greatness. We strive for excellence and share our knowledge so that users and developers become creative and great, become ‘greative’.[/grve_icon_box][vc_empty_space height="60"][grve_icon_box icon_size="small" icon_library="entypo" icon_color="primary-5" title="DEDICATED TEAM" heading="h5" animation="fadeInRight" animation_delay="900" margin_bottom="0" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-tag"]Support all the way through. We share our web design wisdom and excellence for you to evolve and stand out from the competition.[/grve_icon_box][vc_empty_space height="150"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row footer_feature="yes" padding_top="150" padding_bottom="150"][vc_column][grve_slogan title="FIND THE REASONS TO WORK WITH US" heading="h2" text_style="subtitle" align="center" animation="fadeInUp" animation_delay="300" button_text="Get in touch with us" button_type="outline" button_color="black" button_size="extralarge" button_link="url:%23||" button2_text=""]WITH RESPECT TO YOUR NEED TO STAND OUT FROM THE PACK[/grve_slogan][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded:
[vc_row header_feature="yes" padding_top="120" padding_bottom="120" margin_bottom="0" section_id="start"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_custom_heading text="01." font_container="tag:div|font_size:80|text_align:left|color:%23f1b144|line_height:90px" css=".vc_custom_1443537405904{margin-bottom: 18px !important;}"][grve_slogan title="GETTING STARTED" heading="h3" subtitle="Installing Blade" button_text="" button2_text=""][/grve_slogan][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_tta_accordion active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="Installing Blade and its required plugins" tab_id="1442669368011-4ffdb702-44dd"][vc_column_text]Before all else you must setup a WordPress version on your server. After downloading the package, you will have “Blade” folder and “Blade.zip” file inside the Theme package. You can either choose to upload the Theme to your server via FTP (just upload the folder “Blade” into the folder wp-content/themes) or via WordPress upload function ( Appearance > Themes > Install Themes > Upload ) using the “Blade.zip” file. After the installation of the Blade Theme do not forget to install the required plugins: Visual Composer, Blade Extension Plugin and Contact Form 7. Especially without the Visual Composer and the Blade Extension Plugin you won’t be able to use most of our elements.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How to Update Blade and its required plugins" tab_id="1442669368038-55a783a8-99c0"][vc_column_text]This is for sure the easiest and fastest way to update Blade. The only thing you have to do is to activate the theme update and enter your Themeforest username and an API key (from Envato). Follow the steps below in order to use the auto update:
  1. Go Theme Options > Theme Update
  2. Enable Theme Update
  3. Insert your Themeforest username and an API key from your Envato account (Go Settings > API Keys on Envato’s account)
  4. Save changes and you’re ready.
When there is a new update of Blade you will be informed (message at top) in Appearance >Themes screen and in Theme Options screen. Then you will be able to update Blade with just one-click. Don’t forget to update the required plugins in case that you are prompted.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Import Demo Content in Blade with 1-click" tab_id="1442669703789-0801e7f7-3855"][vc_column_text]With Blade, you have the possibility to import any of the demos with just ONE click. Just follow the steps below:
  1. Install and activate the required plugin Blade Demo Data Importer
  2. Go Blade Demos in the WP Dashboard
  3. Select the demo you wish to import (you can additionally select to import Dummy Content, Theme Options or/and Widgets).
  4. Click Import and in a few seconds you will have the whole content in your WP installation.
  5. Have Fun!
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_type="color" padding_top="120" padding_bottom="120" margin_bottom="0" bg_color="#f4f4f4" section_id="options"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_custom_heading text="02." font_container="tag:div|font_size:80|text_align:left|color:%23f1b144|line_height:90px" css=".vc_custom_1443701060434{margin-bottom: 18px !important;}"][grve_slogan title="THEME OPTIONS" heading="h3" subtitle="Blade Philosophy" button_text="" button2_text=""][/grve_slogan][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_tta_accordion][vc_tta_section title="The main Blade Philosophy" tab_id="1442669850093-652e1ff7-61f8"][vc_column_text]Blade Options panel is built with the renowned Redux Framework and gives you many configuration options in a user-friendly environment. Click the Blade tab from the main WordPress navigation and then you will be able to access and enjoy many core features of Blade. All the options have detailed descriptions in order to explain their purpose. Blade’s main philosophy is that the user can have the power to make global settings from Theme Options on how to change the appearance of each Post format ( Pages/Posts/Portfolios) and in addition to be able to override almost everything through the Single Post formats (Pages/Posts/Portfolios). For example: Under Theme Options > Page Options you can select on whether you wish your Page header to overlap the content and select the Header Style you prefer (Default/Light/Dark). That means that the settings you will make will affect every single page of your site. In a creation of a Page, you can surely override this selection (as and most of them). This is the Blade Magic![/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Header Possibilities in Blade" tab_id="1442669850208-d5e9d427-0d9b"][vc_column_text]Most of these elements can have their own align without one’s place affecting the other’s. This way, virtually dozens of combinations can turn out. If you take into account the TopBar that offers 2 places (left and right) and it’s off the logic On/Off and Add elements, Blade can satisfy even the most demanding user. Last but not least, Blade provides 3 different Header Modes that you can find under Theme Options > Header Options > Header Mode. The Default Header Mode, the Logo on Top Mode and the Side Mode. All the modes have their own settings (colors, logos etc) via Appearance > Customize. Don’t forget that above your content you can set the default titles (posts, pages, portfolio items), the Feature section area ( available in pages, posts, portfolio items and Woo products ) and the Anchor menu (available in pages, posts, portfolio items and Woo products ) option.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How to set up your Footer in Blade" tab_id="1442669850333-64e65830-2062"][vc_column_text]Blade provides multiple footer layouts that you can choose from. You can select various column layouts or have a single column if you wish. You just need to go to Theme Options > Footer Options in order to build your footer. Afterwards the creation of your footer layout, you will probably want to add your content. Simply go to Appearance > Widgets. Drag any of the provided widgets to the footer widget areas (Footer 1-4), order and reorder them as you wish and customise the settings. In the Copyright Area, you can add text (TinyMCE), socials and menu, centered or in the left-right corners.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top="120" padding_bottom="120" margin_bottom="0" section_id="elements"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_custom_heading text="03." font_container="tag:div|font_size:80|text_align:left|color:%23f1b144|line_height:90px" css=".vc_custom_1443701168750{margin-bottom: 18px !important;}"][grve_slogan title="HANDCRAFTED ELEMENTS" heading="h3" subtitle="Set the elements" button_text="" button2_text=""][/grve_slogan][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_tta_accordion][vc_tta_section title="How to set the Blog Element" tab_id="1442670138356-0e84659c-5506"][vc_column_text]The Blog element is undoubtedly one of the most important elements which most of the users will probably use. Based on that fact, Blade really offers multiple options for this element. Let’s see them briefly, starting with the basic styles.
  1. Large Media
  2. Small Media
  3. Masonry
  4. Grid
  5. Carousel
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How to set the Portfolio Element" tab_id="1442670138519-42f235f2-6c67"][vc_column_text]The Portfolio element is surely one of the most famous elements. Based on that fact, Blade really offers multiple options for this element as well. Let’s see them briefly, starting with the basic styles.
  1. Grid Style
  2. Masonry Style
  3. Small Media
  4. Carousel
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Contact Forms in Blade" tab_id="1442670138697-08351f52-e37e"][vc_column_text]With this element, you can simply use any Contact Form 7 you’ve created. When using the Contact Form, the default layout is to have one field per row. However, you can have multiple fields in the same row by adding some HTML markup. For example:[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_type="color" padding_top="120" padding_bottom="120" margin_bottom="0" bg_color="#f4f4f4" section_id="features"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_custom_heading text="04." font_container="tag:div|font_size:80|text_align:left|color:%23f1b144|line_height:90px" css=".vc_custom_1443701451195{margin-bottom: 18px !important;}"][grve_slogan title="EXTRA FEATURES" heading="h3" subtitle="SIMPLY ADVANCED" button_text="" button2_text=""][/grve_slogan][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_tta_accordion][vc_tta_section title="How to use the Sliding Area" tab_id="1442670393585-655d3c7c-012b"][vc_column_text]The Sliding Area feature is an extra hidden sidebar area at the right of the site. It can be used in order to have the widgets of the Sidebar area you select via Appearance > Widgets. The main concept behind this is the quick access to useful information. Moreover, you are able to enable it globally per custom post type and override it per single custom post type. For example, you can enable the Sliding area with your preferable Sidebar globally for your pages in Theme Options > Page Options and then, in a specific page, you may disable it or select a different Sidebar area just for this page. This is Blade’s philosophy.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Blade and Visual Composer" tab_id="1442670393790-e607c9d3-a9f2"][vc_column_text]Blade comes with the Visual Composer (value $34), a visual layout builder that allows you to forget about the syntax of the shortcodes and create multiple layouts within minutes without writing a single line of code! You can edit, delete, increase and decrease the size of each item. Furthermore, you can reorder the elements, copy-paste and save templates. It has very simple and instinctive interface! Don’t forget to read the Rows/Columns article in this documentation, where you will discover the amazing responsive possibilities. Blade uses indeed the latest versions of VC preserving 90% of functionality and features (only a small percentage is handled byBlade for technical purposes). However, Blade ’s elements are especially handmade for the theme’s preferences and they harmoniously use the amazing visual interface of the VC. That means you will not find just one Visual Composer copy in Blade![/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What about SEO?" tab_id="1442670393995-844614f4-dd3c"][vc_column_text]Blade is built with SEO best-practices in mind. We use heading tags (H1,H2,H3…) for titles and for the main content which is good practice for search engine site. Moreover, you can select the heading tags in most of the elements (and for the widget titles) for better results. It goes without saying that Blade uses valid HTML5 code and CSS3. Search engines would love the clean code of Blade. Additionally, Blade uses internal site linking, which is vital for search engines (two predefined navigation menus, related portfolios etc). Blade is also fully compatible with the two most popular WP Seo plugins, All in One SEO and WordPress SEO by Yoast, in case you need something more specific for your site optimization. Be sure that we have done our best for your site google ranking.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_column_height="middle-content" footer_feature="yes" padding_top="150" padding_bottom="150" margin_bottom="0"][vc_column width="2/3" tablet_sm_width="1"][grve_typed_text typed_prefix="BLADE COMES WITH" typed_values="LIVE DOCUMENTATION,VIDEO TUTORIALS,DEDICATED SUPPORT,LIFETIME UPDATES" heading="h4" align="center" textspeed="100" backspeed="80" startdelay="0" backdelay="500" loop="yes" cursor_text="_"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" tablet_sm_width="1"][grve_button align="center" animation="fadeInUp" button_text="Come On Board Now" button_link="url:%23||"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Headers
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row header_feature="yes" padding_top="90" margin_bottom="0" padding_bottom="90"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1443538596041{padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}"][grve_icon icon_size="large" align="center" icon_library="entypo" icon_color="black" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-window"][grve_slogan title="Header Manipulations" heading="h2" increase_heading="140" subtitle="You have the stick we give you the magic" align="center" button_text="" button2_text=""]Combine the header layouts, elements with the TopBar and the unique Feature section at your imagination’s convenience.[/grve_slogan][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row margin_bottom="0"][vc_column][grve_single_image image="8425"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row heading_color="light" equal_column_height="middle-content" bg_type="color" bg_color="#232323" padding_top="90" padding_bottom="90" margin_bottom="0"][vc_column width="1/2"][grve_icon_box icon_type="char" icon_size="small" icon_color="white" icon_shape="circle" icon_shape_color="primary-1" icon_char="1" title="Default Header" animation="fadeIn" animation_delay="400"]This is the most common layout for your header. Easily align your menu in 3 different positions, place the header below the famous Greatives feature section and use the TopBar positions.[/grve_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" mobile_width="hide"][grve_single_image animation="fadeInLeft" animation_delay="600" image="7498" retina_image="7499"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][grve_single_image animation="fadeInRight" animation_delay="600" image="8347" retina_image="8348"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_column_height="middle-content" bg_type="color" padding_top="90" padding_bottom="90" margin_bottom="0" bg_color="#f4f4f4"][vc_column width="1/2"][grve_icon_box icon_type="char" icon_size="small" icon_color="white" icon_shape="circle" icon_shape_color="primary-1" icon_char="2" title="Side Header" animation="fadeIn" animation_delay="400"]Blade provides the sticky Side Navigation where you can align the logo and menu as you wish and have the header elements below. You can also use this with boxed layout and TopBar elements.[/grve_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" mobile_width="hide"][grve_single_image animation="fadeInLeft" animation_delay="600" image="7514" retina_image="7515"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][grve_single_image animation="fadeInRight" animation_delay="600" image="8350" retina_image="8351"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row heading_color="light" equal_column_height="middle-content" bg_type="color" bg_color="#232323" padding_top="90" padding_bottom="90" margin_bottom="0"][vc_column width="1/2"][grve_icon_box icon_type="char" icon_size="small" icon_color="white" icon_shape="circle" icon_shape_color="primary-1" icon_char="3" title="Logo on top" animation="fadeIn" animation_delay="400"]Another Header Layout which offers multiple options for you to choose. Align the Logo and Menu in 3 different positions, combine with the TopBar, set different colors for Logo/Menu areas and many more.[/grve_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" mobile_width="hide"][grve_single_image animation="fadeInLeft" animation_delay="600" image="7498" retina_image="7499"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][grve_single_image animation="fadeInRight" animation_delay="600" image="8353" retina_image="8354"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row heading_color="light" bg_type="image" bg_image_type="parallax" color_overlay="primary-1" opacity_overlay="90" footer_feature="yes" padding_top="150" padding_bottom="150" bg_image="7432" font_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.95)"][vc_column][grve_slogan title="ATTENTION PLEASE" heading="h3" increase_heading="140" text_style="subtitle" align="center" button_text="Purchase Blade Now" button_color="black" button_hover_color="white" button_size="large" button_link="url:%23||" button2_text=""]Have in mind that this page presents only a sample of the endless header possibilities. [/grve_slogan][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Feature Excellence
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row heading_color="primary-1" section_type="fullwidth" bg_type="color" scroll_header_style="light" scroll_section_title="Blade" font_color="#ffffff" bg_color="#232323"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1444208949403{padding-right: 8% !important;padding-left: 8% !important;}"][grve_single_image image_shape="circle" image="8389" retina_image="8390"][grve_slogan title="WE BRING BLADE" heading="h2" increase_heading="140" subtitle="Your feedback has been delivered" align="center" button_text="" button2_text=""]After several months of work and mainly with the consideration of your amazing feedback, we present the most straightforward and multi-functional WordPress Theme in which Flexibility and Simplicity exist side-by-side. [/grve_slogan][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row heading_color="dark" bg_type="image" font_color="#000000" scroll_section_title="Case Studies" bg_image="8413"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1445176691994{padding-right: 18% !important;padding-left: 18% !important;}"][grve_single_image image="5098" retina_image="5099"][grve_slogan title="Case Studies" heading="h2" increase_heading="140" align="center" button_text="Checkout our demos" button_type="outline" button_color="black" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fgreatives.eu%2Fthemes%2Fblade%2Fpromote%2F%23case-studies||" button2_text=""]Besides the main one, Blade offers detailed demos, just for starting out. There is nothing ‘bulk’ here, every single item was made with love and passion by Greatives. Get inspired for your creations. Have in mind that Blade’s demos represent only 10% of its possibilities.[/grve_slogan][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row heading_color="light" section_type="fullwidth" equal_column_height="middle-content" bg_type="image" color_overlay="custom" color_overlay_custom="rgba(165,163,151,0.97)" scroll_header_style="light" scroll_section_title="Portfolios" font_color="#e4e3e0" margin_bottom="0" bg_image="6023"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1444208949403{padding-right: 8% !important;padding-left: 8% !important;}"][grve_slogan title="Portfolio & Single Items" heading="h2" button_text="" button2_text=""]Use plenty of layouts, options, hover styles to create the portfolio overviews you ’ve always dreamt of and impress the world simply and smartly. Create anything you can imagine by using the amazing Blade elements in the single portfolio items.[/grve_slogan][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][grve_single_image image="8415" retina_image="8416"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row heading_color="light" section_type="fullwidth" equal_column_height="middle-content" bg_type="image" color_overlay="custom" color_overlay_custom="rgba(35,35,35,0.97)" scroll_header_style="light" font_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.85)" margin_bottom="0" bg_image="7431" scroll_section_title="Blog"][vc_column width="1/2"][grve_single_image image="8418" retina_image="8419"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1444410963190{padding-right: 8% !important;padding-left: 8% !important;}"][grve_slogan title="Blog & Single Posts" heading="h2" button_text="" button2_text=""]Grid, masonry, large and small media layouts are here waiting for you to decide the appropriate style for your blog. Dozens of blog options to make it unique. Standard, Gallery, Link, Quote, Video and Audio post formats are ready to be used with multiple extra options.[/grve_slogan][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row scroll_section_title="WooCommerce"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1445179287395{padding-right: 18% !important;padding-left: 18% !important;}"][grve_single_image image="7098" retina_image="7099"][grve_slogan title="Professional WooCommerce" heading="h2" increase_heading="140" align="center" button_text="" button2_text=""]Blade does not just support WooCommerce. It takes your online shop to the next level. Build your own unique online shop in a few minutes and customize your pages in order to showcase your products.[/grve_slogan][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row heading_color="primary-1" section_type="fullwidth" bg_type="color" scroll_header_style="light" scroll_section_title="Elements" font_color="#ffffff" bg_color="#232323"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1444208949403{padding-right: 8% !important;padding-left: 8% !important;}"][grve_single_image image="5098" retina_image="5099"][grve_slogan title="Handcrafted Elements" heading="h2" align="center" button_text="" button2_text=""]Especially handmade for the theme’s preferences which harmoniously use the amazing visual interface of the Visual Composer. More than 40 thoroughly tested elements with detailed descriptions will make your life much easier. No code skills needed![/grve_slogan][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row section_type="fullwidth" equal_column_height="middle-content" bg_type="color" scroll_section_title="Options Panel"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1445178013027{padding-right: 8% !important;padding-left: 8% !important;}"][grve_slogan title="Innovative Option Panel" heading="h2" button_text="" button2_text=""]Blade Options panel is built with the renowned Redux Framework and gives you many configuration options in a user-friendly environment. More than that, you are able to override almost every global option through the Single Post formats (Pages/Posts/Portfolios/Products)[/grve_slogan][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][grve_single_image align="right" image="8411"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row heading_color="light" bg_type="image" scroll_header_style="light" scroll_section_title="Support" font_color="#ffffff" bg_image="8116"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1444208949403{padding-right: 8% !important;padding-left: 8% !important;}"][grve_icon icon_size="large" align="center" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-life-ring" icon_color="red"][grve_slogan title="Dedicated Support" heading="h2" align="center" button_text="" button2_text=""]We guarantee you premium support for every buyer of Blade. Trust us, we know from first hand the true meaning of the word "Support". We never leave anyone high and dry.[/grve_slogan][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row heading_color="dark" bg_type="color" font_color="#000000" scroll_section_title="Feedback"][vc_column][grve_single_image image="5579" retina_image="5580"][grve_slogan title="Amazing Customers' Feedback" heading="h2" align="center" button_text="" button2_text=""]Blade is the result from the trustworthy and everlasting interaction with you, OUR customers. Thank you all so much! We look forward to supporting you all the way through![/grve_slogan][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Boundless creativity. Never rest, always in a creative flux. We test the limits of creativity every single day to meet the most demanding minds out there.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

align="center" icon_library="entypo" icon_color="black" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-cog"][grve_slogan title="To Create High Quality themes" heading="h2" subtitle="We Build Frameworks" tablet_sm_width="1-2"][grve_icon_box icon_size="large" align="center" icon_library="entypo" icon_color="primary-5" title="UNIQUE DESIGNS" heading="h5" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-star"]We tick masterfully all the boxes of a complete site by offering cutting-edge design solutions.[/grve_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" tablet_sm_width="1-2"][grve_icon_box icon_size="large" align="center" icon_library="entypo" icon_color="primary-5" title="AMAZING INTERFACE" heading="h5" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-rocket"]Out of love for stylish and functional WP themes and for taking pride to support you.[/grve_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" tablet_sm_width="1-2"][grve_icon_box icon_size="large" align="center" icon_library="entypo" icon_color="primary-5" title="EXTENSIVE TUTORIALS" heading="h5" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-video"]Blade comes with an extensive live documentation and multiple HD videos.[/grve_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column tablet_sm_width="hide" mobile_width="hide"][vc_empty_space height="60px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" tablet_sm_width="1-2"][grve_icon_box icon_size="large" align="center" icon_library="entypo" icon_color="primary-5" title="HIGH RATED TEAM" heading="h5" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-users"]Our customers’ reviews can make all potential customers feel confident about our products.[/grve_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" tablet_sm_width="1-2"][grve_icon_box icon_size="large" align="center" icon_library="entypo" icon_color="primary-5" title="PROBLEM SOLVERS" heading="h5" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-traffic-cone"]For you to stand out we take pride in supporting you all the way through 24/7.[/grve_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" tablet_sm_width="1-2"][grve_icon_box icon_size="large" align="center" icon_library="entypo" icon_color="primary-5" title="GROUNDBREAKERS" heading="h5" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-flag"]With respect to your need to stand out from the pack we offer you our ideas, our dreams.[/grve_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_column_height="middle-content" bg_type="color" bg_color="#eaebef" margin_bottom="0"][vc_column width="1/2" tablet_sm_width="1"][vc_empty_space height="70"][grve_slogan title="FULL CONTROL ON RESTRICTED AREAS!" heading="h4" subtitle="The Blade Theme" button_text="Learn More About Blade" button_type="outline" button_color="black" button_size="small" button_link="url:%23||" button2_text="" margin_bottom="0"]Blade is just the theme to flesh out your dreams and make them a digital, corporeal reality with limited effort.[/grve_slogan][vc_empty_space height="70"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" tablet_sm_width="1"][grve_single_image image="6642"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row heading_color="light" equal_column_height="middle-content" bg_type="color" bg_color="#232323" padding_top="60" padding_bottom="60" margin_bottom="0"][vc_column][grve_typed_text typed_prefix="BLADE COMES WITH" typed_values="LIVE DOCUMENTATION,VIDEO TUTORIALS,DEDICATED SUPPORT,LIFETIME UPDATES" heading="h4" text_color="primary-5" align="center" textspeed="100" backspeed="80" startdelay="0" backdelay="500" loop="yes" cursor_text="_"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top="100" padding_bottom="100" margin_bottom="0"][vc_column][grve_single_image image_shape="circle" image="5789" retina_image="5790"][grve_slogan title="READ OUR STORIES" heading="h2" subtitle="We keep you informed" align="center" button_text="" button2_text=""][/grve_slogan][vc_empty_space][grve_blog blog_style="grid" heading="h5" blog_image_prio="yes" columns="3" columns_tablet_landscape="3" columns_tablet_portrait="3" columns_mobile="1" excerpt_length="15" disable_pagination="yes" hide_comments="yes" hide_like="yes" posts_per_page="3"][grve_button align="center" animation="fadeInUp" button_text="Read all our news" button_type="outline" button_color="black" button_size="large" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fgreatives.eu%2Fthemes%2Fblade%2Fblog-small-media%2F||"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row heading_color="light" equal_column_height="middle-content" bg_type="image" bg_image_type="parallax" color_overlay="custom" color_overlay_custom="rgba(35,35,35,0.97)" padding_top="100" padding_bottom="100" margin_bottom="0" bg_image="4950"][vc_column width="1/3"][grve_icon_box icon_size="extra-small" align="right" icon_library="entypo" title="Responsive Layout" heading="h5" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-mobile" margin_bottom="0"]Blade is an ultra responsive theme. Furthermore, you can easily customize the responsive behavior of your rows/columns.[/grve_icon_box][vc_empty_space height="40"][grve_icon_box icon_size="extra-small" align="right" icon_library="entypo" title="Innovative Framework" heading="h5" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-cog" margin_bottom="0"]Blade options panel is built with the renowned Redux Framework and gives you many configuration options.[/grve_icon_box][vc_empty_space height="40"][grve_icon_box icon_size="extra-small" align="right" icon_library="entypo" title="Video Tutorials" heading="h5" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-video" margin_bottom="0"]Our Vimeo Channel is ready to assist users in learning how to use Blade easily. We expand it continuously. [/grve_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][grve_single_image image="8422" retina_image="8423"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][grve_icon_box icon_size="extra-small" icon_library="entypo" title="Parallax Effect" heading="h5" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-picture" margin_bottom="0"]Blade really loves the Parallax effect. Without doubt, it is one of the smoothest effect on TF. Check it on devices as well.[/grve_icon_box][vc_empty_space height="40"][grve_icon_box icon_size="extra-small" icon_library="entypo" title="Fully Customizable" heading="h5" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-tools" margin_bottom="0"]Blade is suitable for building every website project you have in mind. Flexibility and Simplicity exist side-by-side here.[/grve_icon_box][vc_empty_space height="40"][grve_icon_box icon_size="extra-small" icon_library="entypo" title="Validated Code" heading="h5" icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-code" margin_bottom="0"]It goes without saying that Blade uses valid HTML5. Be sure that search engines would love the clean code of Blade. [/grve_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row footer_feature="yes" padding_top="150" padding_bottom="150"][vc_column][grve_slogan title="SHARE ON" heading="h4" align="center" button_text="" button2_text=""][/grve_slogan][grve_social social_facebook="yes" social_twitter="yes" social_linkedin="yes" social_reddit="yes" grve_likes="yes" icon_color="black" icon_shape="circle" shape_color="grey" shape_type="outline" align="center"][vc_column_text text_style="subtitle"]

With by Greatives - HQ Themes

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Testimonial 01
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Blade is hands-down the most suitable timesaving multi-purpose theme for building any website you have in mind. Embrace your own creative evolution. We make it happen.

item.title: Testimonial 02
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Blade offers stand-out-from-the-pack options and superior aesthetics; become the designer you ’ve always dreamt of. You are now able to impress the world simply and smartly.
